title: Sweetcorn chowder

default: 200ml/7fl oz chicken stock (vegetarians may substitute with vegetable stock)
salt and freshly ground black pepper

steps: Heat the oil in a saucepan. Add the onion and cook for five minutes, until softened.
Add remaining ingredients, except for the parsley and cream, bring to the boil, reduce the heat and simmer for a further five minutes.
Add the parsley and cream and heat through before serving.
